Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is about general comment on the work. Teacher give more specific and some key idea to improve my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI make me feel that I have to recheck that comment again if it true or not, but the feedback from teacher i feel more trustworthy.
